title: Batman: The Animated Series
resume: Batman: The Animated Series is an American animated television series based on the DC Comics superhero Batman. The series was widely praised for its thematic complexity, dark tone, artistic quality, and faithfulness to its title character's crime-fighting origins.

Login to create it. en Login Sign Up  ID: 2098   Expand Batman: The Animated Series   (1992) User Score  Play Trailer Overview Batman: The Animated Series is an American animated television series based on the DC Comics superhero Batman. The series was widely praised for its thematic complexity, dark tone, artistic quality, and faithfulness to its title character's crime-fighting origins.
